title: Typefaces similar to Clarendon?
content: Any reccommendations of typefaces similar to [Clarendon](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Clarendon)?
author: design-ed

comments.content:
Similiar to which weight?

We like [Oxtail](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/www.psyops.com/html/spec_oxtail.html) and [Farao](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/www.stormtype.com/farao.html) a lot (too much?) here.

\> _typefaces similar to Clarendon?_

For what purpose and are you looking for any particular weight or style or a complete range of weights?

[Aurora](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/aurora/) by [Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype)

[Belizio](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/belizio/) by [Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Bureau)

[Corona](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/corona/) by [Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype)

[Excelsior](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/excelsior/) by [Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype)

[Ionic No. 5](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/ionic-no-5/) by [Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype)

[News 701](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/news-701/) by [Bitstream](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bitstream)

[News 702](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/news-702/) by [Bitstream](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bitstream)

...and any Typewriter derivative font (distressed or otherwise) will likely put you in the ballpark.
